titleInfo.title: Wall Relief, Six Bound Captives, Mortuary Temple of Rameses III

mods.abstract: Wall relief of six bound captive figures in three quarter view representative of the various conquered peoples during the reign of Pharaoh Rameses III (New Kingdom - Dynasty XX), facing left; two rows of hieroglyphs (above); untitled print, "542" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

subject.topic: Temple of Ramses III (Medinet Habu Site, Egypt)

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
